attributes.action: Make the PM accountable for not keeping promises made during the election.
attributes.additional_details:
MPs must abide by the contract that they made with their constituents during their election. The manifesto must be made legally binding otherwise there is no point in having a manifesto at all.

Democracy is at risk.
attributes.background: Promises made in a manifesto must be made legally binding. Too many governments spin a web of stories during an election to win votes, but ignore their manifesto when they are in office.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make the government legally accountable for delivering its manifesto promises
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749381
